attributes.action: Halt the BBC closure of Radio 6
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Radio 6 adds a great deal to the cultural diversity of our nation, giving voice to independent music that is otherwise lost to bland programming on other stations.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
